title: Bug 130068[Regression]Report Parameter window doesn't pop up when preview a report with a parameter.
description: Description: Report Parameter window doesn't pop up when previewing a report with a parameter.
OB: When previewing a report with a parameter, the Report Parameter window does not appear.
EB: When previewing a report with a parameter, the Report Parameter window should pop up for value input.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a report parameter without a default value. 
2. Drag the parameter to the Layout. 
3. Click Preview in the Layout of the report.
